Integrations.title: Integrations
Integrations.subtitle: Update the different environment variables on your Letta server
Integrations.label: Environment Variables
Integrations.saveSuccess: Environment variables updated successfully, restarting the ADE server
Integrations.notAvailable: This page is only available when using the embedded Letta server (you are configured to use {serverType})

IntegrationConfigurationDialog.title: Update connection with {integrationName}
IntegrationConfigurationDialog.description: Learn about how to connect and more about this integration <link>here</link>

openAI.description: Add your OpenAI API key to use OpenAI models in the ADE

anthropic.description: Add your Anthropic API key to use Anthropic models in the ADE

ollama.description: Add your Ollama URL to use Ollama models in the ADE

azure.description: Add your Azure API key and base URL to use Azure models in the ADE

composio.description: Add your Composio API key to use Composio tools in the ADE

lmstudio.description: Add your LM Studio base URL to use LM Studio models in the ADE

gemini.description: Add your Gemini API key to use Gemini models in the ADE

togetherai.description: Add your Together API key to use Together models in the ADE

xai.description: Add your xAI API key to use Grok models in the ADE

deepseek.description: Add your DeepSeek API key to use DeepSeek models in the ADE

other.name: Don't see an integration here that's supported in the Letta docs?
other.description: You can directly edit the environment variables in `[your-root-directory]/.letta/env` to set up other integrations

ConnectToLetta.title: Turn on your server
ConnectToLetta.description: Run the command below in your terminal to start your server. Once your server is running, the ADE will be available

Agents.title: Agents
Agents.subtitle: View and manage your agents below

NotConnectedOverlay.details: This should only take 10-30 seconds. Once the server is running, you will be able to access the ADE.
NotConnectedOverlay.detailsSelfHosted: Attempting to connect to your Letta server. Make sure the server is running and accessible at {serverUrl}.

CreateLocalAgentDialog.serverOffline: Your server is offline, please start it to create a new agent.
CreateLocalAgentDialog.serverOfflineConnect: Turn on your server with the command below:
CreateLocalAgentDialog.isFetchingStatus: Sorry, we are still attempting to connect to your server. Please wait a moment.
CreateLocalAgentDialog.title: Create a new agent

alert.title: You are creating an agent on {serverName}
alert.descriptionLocal: This will create an agent locally on your machine. This will not deploy the agent to Letta Cloud.
alert.descriptionRemote: This will create an agent on the remote server. This will not deploy the agent to Letta Cloud.

CreateLocalAgentDialog.error: There was an error creating the agent, below is the error message, please try again or contact support.

starterKits.title: Starter kits
starterKits.description: Choose from a starter pack and customize it in the ADE, or start from scratch

ServerStatus.title: Letta server logs
ServerStatus.subtitle: View the status of your server
ServerStatus.noLogsAvailable: Logs viewer only available when using the embedded Letta server (you are configured to use {serverType})

EditDatabaseSettingsDialog.title: Update server connection
EditDatabaseSettingsDialog.description: Choose how Letta Desktop connects to a Letta server. The embedded server runs locally inside Letta Desktop, and self-hosted allows you to connect to a separate Letta deployment (running locally or remotely).

connectionString.label: Connection String
connectionString.description: Enter the connection string for your external database
connectionString.descriptionNone: Embedded database does not have a connection string

url.label: Server URL
url.description: URL of your remote Letta server

token.label: Authentication Token (optional)
token.description: Token for authenticating with your Letta server

error.missingCloud: API key is required for Letta Cloud

authFailed.label: Auth Failed
authFailed.tooltip: Authentication failed. Please check your token.

failed.label: Failed
failed.tooltip: Could not connect to the server. Please check the URL and ensure the server is running.

SetupProvider.title: Setup Provider
SetupProvider.description: Before we begin, please select how you want your agents to be stored.

ConfigureExternalDatabaseStep.title: Configure your external database
ConfigureExternalDatabaseStep.description: Please enter the connection details for your external database. We use postgres as the database type. If you have a value that isn't required, you can leave it blank.

ConfigureDatabaseTypeStep.description: Select the database type you would like to use to store your agents:

bringYourOwn.label: Bring your own Letta server
bringYourOwn.description: Connect Letta Desktop to a self-hosted instance of Letta. Note: this requires running a Letta server separately from Letta Desktop.

embedded.label: Use an embedded Letta server
embedded.description: This is the easiest option to get started with, all your data is stored on an embedded Letta server instance powered by SQLite.

GlobalTools.title: Tools
GlobalTools.subtitle: View and manage all available tools in your system.
